fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- In the Day, Guess if the player about to be hanged is able to win with Town or not.
- In the Night, shoot someone with your Truth Bullet. (0 use)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Whenever your Guess is correct, you will gain a Truth bullet, but only if the person was actually hanged.
- If you kill a teammate, you will lose all of your Truth Bullets and you won't be allowed to Guess the following day.
- You cannot Guess yourself, even if you can somehow survive the Hanging.
